ul.li: user - specifies the user that owns the file
group - specifies the group that owns the file

mode - the read/write/executable modes on the file, specified in octal format. Examples
0644 => -rw-r--r--
0744 => -rwxr--r--
toDir - the destination directory. The file will get the same name as the source file.
attributes - the attributes to set on the copied file. See the "Attributes" section.
artifact - the artifact id of the file to copy.

section.name: Copy Directory, Extract Artifact and Extract File
section.p: These operation work in the same way and share a common set of attributes.

ul.li: includes and excludes - controls files to include in the archive. See the "File name rewriting" section.
pattern and replacement - controls rewriting of file names. See the "Includes and Excludes" section.
fileAttributes - the attributes to set of any files copied. See the "Attributes" section.
directoryAttributes - the attributes to set of any directories copied. See the "Attributes" section.
from - The directory to copy from.
artifact - The artifact id of the artifact to extract.
